alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 11:45PM EST until February 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Water is over the road at the bridge and enters the back shop near the track. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.2 feet early Friday afternoon. - Action stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM EST Friday.
